CustomField.formula: IF( (Case_Age__c > 12 || (SuppliedEmail = "no-reply@zoom.us" && CONTAINS(Subject, "Voicemail"))) , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "red", 20, 20), IF( Case_Age__c > 6, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "green", 20, 20) ))
CustomField.label: Case Flag
